thread.title: ​Ultimate Air’s NYC passengers will fly to a new airport for a week
thread.title_full: ​Ultimate Air’s NYC passengers will fly to a new airport for a week

author: Chris Wetterich
title: ​Ultimate Air’s NYC passengers will fly to a new airport for a week
text:
​Ultimate Air’s NYC passengers will fly to a new airport for a week Jul 28, 2015, 2:38pm EDT Industries & Tags Chris Wetterich Staff reporter and columnist Cincinnati Business Courier Chris Wetterich Staff reporter and columnist Cincinnati Business Courier Home of the Day Enlarge Chris Wetterich | Courier Ultimate Air passengers headed to the New York City area between Aug. 12 and Aug. 18 will… more Ultimate Air passengers headed to the New York City area between Aug. 12 and Aug. 18 will be flying to a different airport than normal. The public charter airline, which has proven popular with Cincinnati business travelers and fliers from Lunken Airport and Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport , will fly to Teterboro Airport in New Jersey that week instead of Morristown. The Morristown Airport is closing that week to make runway improvements, according to a news release from Ultimate Air. Passengers will be able to rent cars at Teterboro and have family and friends pick them up as long as they have identification and know the flight number for the passenger they are picking up.
